Message.Title: Do 59 million Americans Have a Voice?
Message.Msg: That is the number of votes Romney received.

Topic.Title: IBM making same dumb move HP made

Message.Msg: Be careful. IBM will take your farm and force you to work it, calling you by your American name "Uncle Tom" vs. Radheshyam, and then take away your benefits.

Message.Title: IBM will use 401k money to buffer softness in q1 q2 and q3 2013
Message.Msg: The accountants are at it again, 2013 will be interesting on all those employee that get layed off before Dec 15, nothing like screwing your employees as you kick them out on the street, where is goverment protection, I hope Andrew Cuomo is looking at this. He also should be looking at all the corparate welfare that IBM get from the State of New York at upsate University

Message.Msg: yeah, but silver medal'ing in the election Olympics isn't what it's cracked up to be....

Message.Title: Why are the charts for one day and five day identical?

Topic.Title: IBM getting out of hardware buisness then co will break up into software / serivces

Message.Msg: In the beginning IBM gave away software to support the mainframe business - now it's close to be turned upside down: giving away mainframes to support the software/service business. IBM will never give up the mainframe business because it is a vital vitamin for the rest of the business.

Topic.Title: IBM making same dumb move HP made

Message.Msg: Sure you did. $194 and climbing. Back to $210 in a blink.

Topic.Title: Do 59 million Americans Have a Voice?

Message.Msg: Yes and his name is Obama, get over it and become part of the human race again. Turn off Fox, the brain washing has got to stop.
